thread.title: Sutton United forced to bring in new floodlights for Arsenal FA Cup tie after demands by TV bosses
thread.title_full: Sutton United forced to bring in new floodlights for Arsenal FA Cup tie after demands by TV bosses

author: jgordon
title: Sutton United forced to bring in new floodlights for Arsenal FA Cup tie after demands by TV bosses
text:
EFL Blinded by the lights Sutton United forced to bring in new floodlights for Arsenal FA Cup tie after demands by TV bosses 
Minnows will earn nearly a quarter of a million pounds just from broadcasting alone in a huge boost for the club By JAMIE GORDON Comments SUTTON UNITED have been forced to install new floodlights for their hotly-anticipated clash with Arsenal. 
TV bosses demanded the improvements as an expectant nation tunes in hoping to witness one of the biggest upsets in FA Cup history. You know we said those new lights were quite bright….er. yeah. #explodingsuns #retinaldamage pic.twitter.com/JyzUyw1NH6 
— Gandermonium (@Gandermonium) February 19, 2017 
The Gander Green Lane facilities were deemed not good enough with incredibly bright additional lights added and tested over the weekend. 
Keep up to date with ALL the FA Cup news, gossip, transfers and goals plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Sutton bloggers Gandermonium showed off the ridiculous glow on social media to show there will be certainly no issue this evening. Related Stories FA Cup live Sutton vs Arsenal: Follow all build up as the fifth-tier minnows take on the Premier League giants in the FA Cup Preview Sutton United vs Arsenal: What time does it kick-off, what TV channel is it on, and what is the latest team news? IAN WRIGHT Arsenal have no excuses... Sutton's plastic pitch should suit Arsene Wenger's side down to the ground Beer we go All hands to the pump as Sutton United order 6,000 extra pint glasses for visit of Arsenal Tree surgin' Sutton goalkeeper Ross Worner used to be a lumberjack... and now he's ready to cut Arsenal down to size hot stuff Sutton's reserve keeper Wayne Shaw is famed for his 'Roly-Poly Goalie' chilli sauce... and turned down NAKED photoshoot I'M A BEERLIEVER Sutton star Jamie Collins admits he'll be off work boozing a few days if the part-timers KO Arsenal Lincoln City fans celebrate after drawing Sutton or Arsenal in the FA Cup quarter-finals 
If they should manage to topple the Gunners on their plastic pitch, the two tiny sides will meet in the quarter-finals. 
That would ensure one of the National League sides ended up playing at Wembley in the semi-finals. 
As well as new floodlights, a new temporary seated stand was installed at the ground to house an extra 90 Arsenal fans. PA:Press Association Jamie Collins scores a penalty to send Sutton through to FA Cup fifth round against Arsenal PA:Press Association 2 Sutton made more FA Cup history by stunning Championship promotion hopeful Leeds in the last round 
Arsenal come into the tie on the back of a 5-1 thumping against Bayern Munich with the FA Cup now Arsene Wenger's only real chance of silverware. 
Check out the latest odds for Sutton United vs Arsenal with Sun Bets Sutton United 1-0 Leeds : Collins’ penalty causes FA Cup shock
